<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">6e560eb01bc3c15093c1a685624bcbb2</macroponent><name>stylized_text_1_text</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api
}) {
    var msg = "Current experience tailored for: ";
    var name = api.context.props.name;

    if (name == null) {
        name = "Nobody is being served";
    }

    return (msg + name);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steve.mccluskey</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-21 19:56:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>dda4f6f887c701505f40cbb4dabb35fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_1_text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train" source="x_snc_creatorcon_0">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_dda4f6f887c701505f40cbb4dabb35fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steve.mccluskey</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-21 19:57:13</sys_updated_on><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
